REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f1148 reute b f BC-PACIOFIC-TELESIS-<PAC 10-20 0042

TEXT.TITLE: PACIOFIC TELESIS <PAC> TO REPURCHASE STOCK
TEXT.BODY: Pacific Telesis Group said it plans to repurchase up to 10 mln of its 432.1 mln common shares in the open market or privately, with repurchases to be financed by general corporate funds. Reuter
